scripts.start: npm run build && node src/index.js server
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:vite" "npm run dev:express" "npm run dev:contract"
scripts.dev:contract:deploy: cd contract && npx hardhat --network localhost ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/Eyeballer.js
scripts.dev:contract:seed: cd contract && npx hardhat --network localhost run scripts/seed.js
scripts.dev:contract:nonce: cd contract && npx hardhat --network localhost run scripts/nonce.js
